Name: FBL-8a Arms Imperial Red
Description:
Item Type: Light Armor
Damage Reduction: 20%
Temp. Rating: -35 / 65 Â°C

CDS's quest to create the ideal light armor continues with the FBL-8a. This light armor will keep you fast on your feet with its strategic mix of protective plating and reinforced nano-weave fabrics. While the armor works with any undersuit, it was specifically designed to match the FBL-8u undersuit with special attention given to how the two fit together to make the set as streamlined and responsive as possible.
